Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at City Hotel Comfitel, you'll be centrally located in St. Petersburg, convenient to Cossack Cathedral of the Elevation of the Holy Cross and Kazan Cathedral. This hotel is within close proximity of Horrors of St. Petersburg Museum and Planet Neptune.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 33 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and blackout drapes/curtains.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance. If you'd like to spend the day shopping, you can hop on the shuttle (surcharge).

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Buffet breakfasts are available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Buffet breakfasts are available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance. If you'd like to spend the day shopping, you can hop on the shuttle (surcharge).

Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and blackout drapes/curtains.

With a stay at City Hotel Comfitel, you'll be centrally located in St. Petersburg, convenient to Cossack Cathedral of the Elevation of the Holy Cross and Kazan Cathedral. This hotel is within close proximity of Horrors of St. Petersburg Museum and Planet Neptune.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Cossack Cathedral of the Elevation of the Holy Cross - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Horrors of St. Petersburg Museum - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Planet Neptune - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Loft Project Etagi - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Bryantsev Youth Theatre - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Saint-Petersburg State Jazz Philharmonic Hall - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Church of the Resurrection of Christ on Obvodny Canal - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Bread Museum - 2 km / 1.3 mi
A. S. Popov Central Museum of Communications - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Dostoyevsky Museum - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Museum of Railway Machinery - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Arctic and Antarctic Museum - 2.2 km / 1.3 mi
Vladimirskaya Church - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Tovstonogov Bolshoi Drama Theater - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Trinity Cathedral - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi

The preferred airport for City Hotel Comfitel is St. Petersburg (LED-Pulkovo) - 13 km / 8.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Hotel Tariff Notes: All people with citizenship other than Russian are required to be registered with local immigration authorities and should pay for it the local registration service fee 4-5 EURO per person / per stay directly to the hotel upon check in.
